page.title: 12SHOPPING
page.content: Our questionnaire asked people about their shopping habits. Where do they shop, how do they get to the shops and how often they shop? Although people do use the village shop for day-to-day needs most go to the nearest towns to do their main shopping. Cheltenham is the most visited, followed by Tewkesbury, Winchcombe, Bishops CLeeve and Evesham. The vast majority of people go by car to do their shopping. The only bus service runs to Cheltenham and back. Almost everybody shops weekly. Most people grow some of their own produce in gardens or allotments.
